column4: Hello. I'm having some problems with Amarok in Ubuntu. If I try launching it I just get the splash screen and nothing else. Can someone help me?
also type in terminal "amarok" to see if there's any error messages that might help find the prob
Bodsda apparently that message is normal for amarok startup --- according to the internet, and my amarok install on KDE
But it should be able to start up anyway, shouldn't it?
Bodsda right --- but the error message is standard
Bodsda:: one thing to try--> sudo apt-get install libxine-extracodecs
It says that version isn't available, but that libxine1-ffmpeg
Exactly the swame problem. Amarok SHOULD work even though I'm using gnome, right?
Bodsda ok so that package is not the issue --- saw that on the web, related to this problem
Bodsda: I have no idea how it happened, but my ~/.kde library had become u-w'ed
